summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated Saturday, August 10, 2019. It details staff assignments, shift changes, leave statuses, and overtime for correctional officers and other personnel. The document appears to be a routine internal staffing log.

keyFacts: This document is a routine staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 10, 2019.
It details shift assignments, leave statuses (Sick Leave, Annual Leave), and overtime/comptime occurrences for correctional staff.
The roster includes posts such as SHU (Special Housing Unit), CONTROL, ESCORT, LOBBY, and VISIT, indicating standard prison operations.
No direct mention of Jeffrey Epstein, inmates, or specific case-related events is made in this staffing log.
